name: Skin Relief Cream
description:
*VANESSA'S CHOICE*:
"I don't have eczema but I used this for a patch of dry skin and it was lovely and soothing and provided immediate relief from irritation"

A natural emollient, Melanie’s Garden Skin Relief Cream For Skin Prone To Eczema can help to prevent dryness and excess moisture loss, protect the skin and improve the appearance of skin prone to eczema. This delicate cream contains Aloe Vera well known for its calming and soothing properties, Vitamins A and E and is rich in Essential Fatty Acids 3,6,7&9.  Apply twice per day. Suitable for use on face and body.  Suitable for all ages.

name: Pure Harmony Cream
description:
*VANESSA'S CHOICE*:
"The Harmony range is an excellent range for sensitive skin."

Gentle, restorative cream replenishes skin’s vital nutrients, protects against irritation and deeply hydrates. Skin appears smoother with a more balanced tone and texture thanks to this protective formula boosted with Renovage, Gardenia Plant Stem Cells and Asiatioside.

Tip:
The yellow tone of the cream will neutralize redness so pat a generous amount on your skin to achieve a flawless look.

Bioactive Ingredients of Interest

• Renovage – Increases skin hydration, firmness and tone. Decreases pigmentation and reduces pore size.

• Phytostem Gardenia – Derived from a tropical evergreen shrub of southern Asia; provides replenishing skin nutrients, and healing and regenerative properties. Improves skin tone, elasticity and minimizes wrinkles.

• Asiaticoside – A wound healer that is an anti-inflammatory, protects against skin degradation, stimulates fibroblast activity.

• MDI Complex – Leads to a better enzyme equilibrium needed for a healthy skins appearance. Increases skin resistance to external irritants, protects against skin irritation, reduces the appearance of redness.


Aqua (Water), Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glycerin, Cetearyl Olivate, Alcohol Denat., Squalane, Sorbitan Olivate, Hippophae Rhamnoides (Seabuckthorn) Oil, Gluconolactone, Gardenia Jasminoides Callus Culture, Asiaticoside, Arnica Montana Flower Extract, Pisum Sativum (Pea) Extract, Ginkgo Biloba Leaf Extract, Bambusa Vulgaris (Bamboo) Leaf/Stem Extract, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Oil, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Betula Alba (Birch) Bark Extract, Tocopherol (D-alpha), Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Teprenone, Phytosphingosine, Sodium Hyaluronate (L), Caprylyl Glycol, Xanthan Gum, Glucosamine HCl, Phytic Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Phenethyl Alcohol, Potassium Sorbate

name: Pure Harmony Serum
description:
*VANESSA'S CHOICE*:
"The Harmony range is an excellent range for sensitive skin."

Reduces the appearance of puffiness and gives skin a fresher, more youthful glow. Blended with Niacinamide (the water-soluble form of vitamin B3), Kinetin and Licorice, this restorative serum cools, calms and brightens sensitive skin without irritation. 

Bioactive Ingredients of Interest

• Niacinamide – A water-soluable form of vitamin B3. provides potent anti-inflammatory and anti-glycation activity. Has anti-aging effect by stimulating collagen synthesis and improves barrier function and reduces hyperpigmentation.

• Kinetin – A highly potent growth factor that improves the skins ability to be a barrier against water loss. Fights the suns damage.

• Licorice – Native to Europe; offers anti-inflammatory, anti-microbial activity with antioxidant benefits.

Aqua (Water), Niacinamide, Glycerin, Squalane, Phenyl t-Butylnitrone (Spin Trap), Globularia Cordifolia Callus Culture Extract, Tambourissa Trichophylla Bark Extract, Epilobium Angustifolium Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Centella Asiatica Meristem Cell Culture, Magnolia Grandiflora Bark Extract, Totarol, Rosmarinyl Glucoside, Gallyl Glucoside, Caffeyl Glucoside, Tocopherol (D-alpha), Folic Acid, Kinetin, Lactic Acid (L), Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Alcohol Denat., Lonicera Caprifolium (Honeysuckle) Flower Extract, Lonicera Japonica (Honeysuckle) Flower Extract, Polyglyceryl-4 Caprate, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Water, Alcohol, Xanthan Gum, Phytic Acid, Potassium Sorbate

name: Pure Harmony Mask
description:
*VANESSA'S CHOICE*:
"The Harmony range is an excellent range for sensitive skin."

Comfort and calm sensitive skin with this restorative mask. This advanced formula— fortified with Arnica, Magnolia and Bisabolol, an essential oil of the Chamomile flower—soothes irritation caused by environmental stress.

Tip:
To get complete relief, keep the mask in the refrigerator and apply it cool to your skin.

Bioactive Ingredients of Interest: 

• Arnica – An anti-inflammatory that improves cellular circulation, provides pain relief and repairs damage associated with skin irritations. 
• Magnolia – Antioxidant, UV protectant, prevents lipid peroxidation, reduces eye tissue by reducing swelling and strengthening weakened capillaries which produce dark circles. 
• AquaCacteen – A succulent that is exceptionally resistant to strong sunlight and extreme drought. Hydrates and soothes skin, protects against environmental stress. 
• Bisabolol – Present in essential oil of the chamomile flower. Reduces inflammation, encourages wound healing, and has anti-bacterial activity.

 Aqua (Water), Glycerin, Bisabolol (L-alpha), Sodium PCA, Magnolia Grandiflora Bark Extract, Arnica Montana Flower Extract, Melia Azadirachta (Neem) Leaf Extract, Melia Azadirachta (Neem) Flower Extract, Coccinia Indica Fruit Extract, Opuntia Ficus-Indica (Cactus) Stem Extract, Solanum Melongena (Eggplant) Fruit Extract, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root Extract, Ocimum Basilicum (Basil) Leaf Extract, Lawsonia Inermis (Henna) Extract, Ocimum Sanctum Leaf Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Flower Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate (L), Amino Esters-1, Panthenol (D), Pearl Powder, Lonicera Caprifolium (Honeysuckle) Flower Extract, Lonicera Japonica (Honeysuckle) Flower Extract, Mica, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Water, Alcohol, Xanthan Gum, Polysorbate 20, Citric Acid, Phytic Acid, Potassium Sorbate

name: Organic Shampoo
description:
*VANESSA'S CHOICE*: 
"Skin Blossom is my choice for an excellent value for money range."

An organic shampoo with mild cleansers that deliver a lovely lather to cleanse and condition without stripping. The special blend of essential oils offer an array of benefits that are a delight for hair and senses. Rosemary stimulates and soothes the hair and scalp, whilst Bergamot gives protection by strengthening hair shafts. Palmarosa moisturises and the citrus mix removes build-up, giving shine. The formula also includes organic Jojoba Oil to calm and soften the hair and scalp. Hair is left clean, healthy, soft and full of life. Made with 76% organic ingredients and certified to the strict Soil Association organic hair care standards. 
This is also vegan products registered by the Vegan Society. 
The gentle formulation of this organic shampoo makes it suitable for all hair types, including sensitive scalps.

Skin Blossom's organic hair care strives to offer good performance without the use of harsh or toxic ingredients. They developed this organic shampoo after many customers advised that they could not get a certified organic shampoo that foamed nicely. Our organic shampoo achieves this using a cleansing agent made from coconuts, so it is kind to you and the environment - as well as being enjoyable to use and leaving hair beautifully clean.

Good for:
- all hair types (except very dry/ damaged)
- thorough cleansing
- those that like a good foaming shampoo

Ingredients

Aqua (Water), Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Coco-Sulfate, Decyl Glucoside, Coco-Glucoside, Benzyl Alcohol, Glycerin**, Sodium Chloride, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Powder*, Sucrose Laurate, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Oil*, Citrus Bergamia (Bergamot) Oil*, Citrus Limonum (Lemon) Oil*, Citrus Aurantifolia (Lime) Oil*, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Sweet Orange) Oil*, Cymbopogon Martinii (Palmarosa) Oil*, Parfum*, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Oil*, Sodium Benzoate, Dehydroacetic Acid, Tocopherol, Alcohol, Citric Acid, Citral, Geraniol, Limonene, Linalool

*Certified as Organically Grown
**Certified as Organically Grown

98.85% natural & free from harsh ingredients like SLS,SLES, ALS, Phylates, Parabens, Phenoxyethanol, DMDM, PEGS, Silicones, synthetic colour & fragrance, Petrochemicals, Urea, DEA, MEA, TEA, GLYCOLS and GM ingredients.

name: Organic Conditioner
description:
*VANESSA'S CHOICE*: 
"Skin Blossom is my choice for an excellent value for money range."

This light organic conditioner feeds hair without the use of conventional agents, instead its power comes from a special formulation with Pracaxi Seed which is native to the Amazon Rain Forest, there's no wonder its rich nutrients feed hair for superb shine and softness. Mix this with conditioning Rosemary, protecting Bergamot, moisturising Palmarosa and citrus adding shine to leave hair soft, manageable, conditioned and radiant. Made with 85% organic ingredients and certified to the strict Soil Association organic hair care standards. 
This is also vegan products registered with the Vegan Society. The gentle formulation of this organic conditioner makes it suitable for all hair types, including sensitive scalps.

Organic hair care products made to the Soil Association organic standards are notoriously difficult to formulate effectively. This is because they do not allow traditional conditioning agents to be used. Skin Blossom's organic conditioner seeks to achieve good performance by using carefully formulated ingredients, and specifically the Pracaxi Seed Oil which is has a very high nutrient content and great softening properties. You may find that when using this organic conditioner it does not have the same feel as others you may have used, but after rinsing and drying you should find your hair is soft, manageable, clean and healthy.

Good for:
- all hair types (except very dry/ damaged)
- more intensive conditioning when left on longer
- those that like a natural conditioner

Ingredients

Aqua (Water), Cetearyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Glycerin*, Glyceryl Stearate, Cetyl Palmitate, Cocoglycerides, Isopropyl Myristate, Pentaclethra Macroloba Seed Oil*, Dehydroacetic Acid, Benzyl Alcohol, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice Powder*, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary)

name: Vivacitie Perfume
description:
*VANESSA'S CHOICE*:
"Vivacities is my favourite perfume – it makes me feel good every time I wear it and I always get lots of compliments. It’s not a girly floral perfume but it is, as claimed, very uplifting to wear and I absolutely love it! The level of chemicals in mainstream perfumes is quite scary so it’s great to use something completely natural and that smells lovely and even makes you feel good too!"

This unique fragrance, in addition to its exquisite scents, has been designed to benefit mind and soul too, thanks to the exclusive blends of Bach Flower essences it contains.

Highly concentrated in perfume, this "Eaux de Parfum" will last all day, so you can enjoy its benefits and its amazing, natural fragrance.

The quintessential perfume to transform your inner feelings with joy and positive energy. The Bach flowers which make up this amazing fragrance breathe a precious scent of joy, clarity and invigorating vitality:

- Top notes: Gorse and Centaury,
- Heart notes: White Chestnut, Olive, Hornbeam
- Base notes: Larch and Mustard

The cheerful and spicy scent of Vivacite(s) de Bach will build up a sense of confidence and will result in an enterprising mind, strengthened with an uplifting sense of renewed energy. Vivacite(s) de Bach is woody, spicy and energising.

Les Fleurs de Bach products are all made using Bach’s original method and are therefore 400 times richer in active ingredients than similar homeopathic remedies which are labelled 5 times. All the Bach Flower Essences used in the products are certified organic by Ecocert

name: NOTOX™ Anti-Wrinkle Serum
description:
*VANESSA'S CHOICE*:
"I have been using this for a month now and honestly think it has made a difference! I would definitely recommend this if you are looking for an effective anti-aging product."

Powerful antioxidants and a unique multi-peptide blend improve skin texture while reducing the appearance of lines and wrinkles. Matrixyl® synthe’6™ reduces wrinkle volume by 21% and wrinkle depth by 19% in 8 weeks. Thymulen® 4 stimulates epidermis regeneration reflecting a youthful appearance. Syn®-Tacks Peptide stimulates collagen formation and minimizes wrinkle depth.

Palmitoyl Tripeptide-38 (Matrixyl® synthe’6™) is the new and improved version of the popular Matrixyl family of ingredients. This new sophisticated advancement is a clean collaboration of notable ingredients that demonstrate through evidence based research and visual effect a reduction in the volume and depth of a wrinkle. In vitro studies strongly stimulated 6 major structural components of the skin.

Acetyl Tetrapetide-2 (Thymulen® 4) - A biomimetic peptide designed to compensate for the natural loss of thymoproietin (youth protein), stimulating the creation macrophages and Langerhans cells (part of the immune response system) and reinvigorating the epidermis’ ability to regenerate.

Hydrolyzed Myrtus Communis (Myrtle) Leaf Extract (Longevicell®) - Cell regenerator, increases tissue longevity, limits degeneration of skin tissue, reduces first signs of aging.

Palmitoyl Dipeptide-5 Diaminohydroxybutyrate, Palmitoyl Dipeptide-5 Diaminobutyroyl Hydroxythreonine (Syn®-Tacks) - Improves collagen production and strengthens the dermal epidermal junction (DEJ) to improve structural strength, improves nourishment and cellular communication, anti-age and anti-wrinkle.

Ingredients
Aqua (Water), Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Water, Glycerin (Vegetable)*, Thermus Thermophilus Ferment (Venuceane™), Pisum Sativum (Pea Peptide) Extract (Proteasyl® TP), Acetyl Tetrapetide-2 (Thymulen® 4), Dextran (Sugar), Palmitoyl Tripeptide-5 (Syn®-Coll), Palmitoyl Tripeptide-38 (Matrixyl® synthe’6™), Alcohol Denatured (Grain)*, Hydrolyzed Myrtus Communis (Myrtle) Leaf Extract (Longevicell®), Palmitoyl Dipeptide-5 Diaminohydroxybutyrate, Palmitoyl Dipeptide-5 Diaminohydroxybutyrate Hydroxythreonine (Syn®-Tacks), rH-Oligopeptide-1 (Epidermal Growth Factor), Lecithin, Squalane (Olive), Opuntia Vulgaris (Cactus) Flower/Stem Extract, Brassica Campestris (Rapeseed) Seed Oil, Levisticum Officinale (Loveage) Oil, Xanthan Gum (Fermented Sugar), Hydroxypropyl Cyclodextrin, Lonicera Japonica (Honeysuckle) Flower Extract, Potassium Sorbate (Salt), Citric Acid (*NOP Certified Organic )

name: Miracle Youth Gel
description:
*VANESSA'S CHOICE*:
"Use this with Super Potent Anti Aging serum for enhanced results. They are not used in the conventional way as you combine them when you apply and Melanie explained to me why:  “Basically the Miracle Gel contains water based ingredients and the serums contain oil based ingredients.  If I were to emulsify these together to make a cream I would have to use chemicals to do this.  By using the gel and the serum together at the point of application you get all the advantages of the oil and water based ingredients without the emulsifiers used in creams and therefore a skin routine that is totally natural. Used together, they will provide a wealth of nutrients for your skin."

A lovely light gel that brightens, tightens and plumps the appearance of the skin. Reduces the appearance of fine lines instantly.  A face-lift in a bottle!  With plant sources of hyaluronic acid, pseudo-collagen and skin brightening ingredients. Diminishes the appearance of age spots over time.  Suitable for all skin types except for very sensitive.  With a beautiful fresh and uplifting aroma.  
Apply a few drops onto clean skin morning and night. Can be used alone or for optimum results mix in palm of hands with Super Potent Anti-Ageing Serum prior to application and apply both products together. Can also be applied under our Daytime Radiance Serum. Suitable for all skin types except for very sensitive.

name: Super Potent Anti-Ageing Serum
description:
*VANESSA'S CHOICE*:
"I really love this serum which is enhanced by using it with the Miracle Youth Gel (as long as you don't have very sensitive skin). They are not used in the conventional way as you combine them when you apply and Melanie explained to me why:  “Basically the Miracle Gel contains water based ingredients and the serums contain oil based ingredients.  If I were to emulsify these together to make a cream I would have to use chemicals to do this.  By using the gel and the serum together at the point of application you get all the advantages of the oil and water based ingredients without the emulsifiers used in creams and therefore a skin routine that is totally natural. Used together, they will provide a wealth of nutrients for your skin."

Bursting with antioxidants CoQ10, Rosemary, vitamins A and E, Omegas 3, 6, 7 & 9 essential fatty acids, cell rejuvenating Sea Buckthorn, Spilanthes Acmella flower extract known to restructure, firm and smooth the appearance of the skin and anti-ageing Frankincense, Neroli and Rosewood essential oils.  Made up of extremely nourishing thin oils that are instantly absorbed. Suitable for all skin types (even sensitive). 
 Although fantastic results can be achieved using this serum alone for optimum results, as long as skin is not very sensitive, mix in palm of hands with Miracle Youth Gel.

name: Mango and Coconut Handcream
description:
This non-sticky mango and coconut hand cream has a lovely fragrance to it and will fit nicely into your handbag.

The Vitamin E will protect your hands and the white willow invigorates them, keeping your hands in great condition whatever the weather and whatever your hands are put through on a daily basis.

The gorgeously packaged mango and coconut hand cream makes for the perfect gift; or a lovely pampering treat for you!

name: Apple Brightening Peel
description:
A potent blend of special plant derived skin brighteners and retexturisers combat and repair signs of sun damage. Lactic and Azelaic acids effectively restore youthful tone, texture and firmness while supporting antioxidant function and healthy hydration. Plant derived Gallic Acid and Mulberry Bark Extract naturally diminish UV-induced discolouration and age-spots. Due to the highly effective nature of this peel, a patch test is recommended prior to use.

Additional information

This product contains natural skin lightening ingredients that may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun. Always use sun protection, wear protective clothing and limit sun exposure.

Bioactive Ingredients of Interest

5% Lactic Acid (L) (Sugar) -
An alpha hydroxy acid that hydrates, exfoliates, refines and perfects the surface of the skin by reducing wrinkles and pigmentation discolourations.

2% Azelaic Acid -
Inhibits tyrosinase activity to reduce pigmentation spotting related to breakouts, treats mild to moderate acne (both inflammatory and comedonal), reduces bacteria growth in the follicles, scavenges free radicals.

1% Malic Acid (L) (Apple) -
From apples, provides antioxidant actions, assists in skin exfoliation and cellular renewal.

Morus Alba (Mulberry) Bark Extract -
Naturally brightens and clears the complexion of pigmentation imbalances. Possesses anti-inflammatory, anti-viral properties while inhibiting photo-aging (shown as wrinkles caused by UV radiation). Shown to inhibit tumor development caused by carcinogenic chemicals and can decrease ultraviolet damage caused DNA breakage resulting in melanoma.

Ingredients
Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit, Glycerin (Vegetable)*, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Water, 5% Lactic Acid (L) (Sugar), Alcohol Denatured (Grain), 2% Azelaic Acid, 1% Malic Acid (L) (Apple), Citrus Medica Limonum (Lemon) Peel Extract, Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea) Leaf Extract*, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Morus Alba (Mulberry) Bark Extract, Polygonum Cuspidatum (Giant Knotweed/Resveratrol) Extract, Aqua (Water), Euterpe Oleracea (Acai) Fruit Extract**, Gallic Acid (Plant), Niacinamide (B3), Allantoin (Comfrey Root), Citrus Racemosa (White Grapefruit) Peel Oil*, Pelargonium Graveolens (Geranium) Flower Oil, Rosa Damascena Flower Oil, Cananga Odorata (Ylang Ylang) Flower Oil, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Sweet Orange) Oil*, Citrus Reticulata (Red Mandarin) Leaf Oil, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate (Green & Biodegradable), Potassium Sorbate, Fragrance/Parfum (Natural), Lecithin. (*Certified Organic)

name: Apple Brightening Cream
description:
A luxurious cream powered by Apple Plant Stem Cells and Daisy Flower Extract to deliver a luminous and even-toned complexion. Rich in Antioxidants to hydrate and plump, your skin will look radiant and healthier.

Tip
Apply a thick layer, and then lay a warm or cool washcloth on your face for a 5-minute facial.

Malus Domestica (Apple) Plant Cell Culture (PhytoCellTec™) - Revolutionary break through ingredient in skin care to stop chronological aging. First topical product to protect human skin stem cells and delay natural aging process by maintaining the activity of skin stem cells. Triggers the skin’s cell potential for infinite regeneration while reducing wrinkle depth.


Renovage - Slows down cells’ biological clock leading to healthier skin. It firms, hydrates, plumps and reduces wrinkles, sun spots, redness and pore size.

Ascorbic Acid - Ascorbic Acid (L) - Water soluble Vitamin C, an antioxidant that strengthens collagen, assists in brightening, provides anti-wrinkle effects, smoothes skin texture, and heals wounds.

Clari-Net – beautiful white lily (aka sea daffodil) found on the northern beaches of Chania. It is an aqueous extract of this sustainable, rare flower, which is grown and harvested in greenhouses to assure sustainability. Tested in-vivo it was shown to significantly reduce skin pigmentation in 6 weeks.

Aqua (Water), Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glycerin, Cetearyl Olivate, Bellis Perennis (Daisy) Flower Extract, Lactic Acid (L), Sorbitan Olivate, Polysorbate 20, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Squalane, Malus Domestica (Apple) Fruit Cell Culture Extract, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Oil, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Citrus Sinensis var. Sanguina (Blood Orange) Oil, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Citrus Grandis (White Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Extract, Humulus Lupulus (Hops) Extract, Pancratium Maritimum Extract, Tocopherol (D-alpha), Ascorbic Acid (L), Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil, Malic Acid (L), Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Tocotrienols, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Elaeis Guineensis (Palm) Oil, Lecithin, Gluconolactone, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Water, Alcohol, Caprylyl Glycol, Dimethicone, Xanthan Gum, Potassium Sorbate, Phenoxyethanol, Teprenone, Phenethyl Alcohol, Sodium Benzoate, Fragrance/Parfum (Natural)

name: Apple Brightening Serum
description:
Advanced formula combines clinically proven ingredients to rapidly diminish the appearance of discolouration and sun-damage (photo-aging). Revolutionary PhytoCellTec™ Apple Stem Cells trigger skin’s natural regenerative process while reducing line depth up to 15% in just 4 weeks. Breakthrough Peptide Melanostatine®5 interrupts the reaction that causes hyperpigmentation to deliver a 33% improvement in skin’s tone and clarity.

Bioactive Ingredients of Interest

Niacinamide (B3) -
Improves oxygenation and ingredient absorption by stimulant actions that increase circulation and detoxification processes, assists in the utilization of B vitamins.

Nonapeptide-1 (Melanostatine®5) -
Biomimetic peptide (mimics body’s natural response) shown to reduce hyperpigmentation by preventing activation of tyrosinase and blocking melanin synthesis.

Malus Domestica (Apple) Fruit Cell Culture (PhytoCellTec™) -
Revolutionary break through ingredient in skin care to stop chronological aging. First topical product to protect human skin stem cells and delay natural aging process by maintaining the activity of skin stem cells. Triggers the skin’s cell potential for infinite regeneration while reducing wrinkle depth.

Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract (Applephenon™) -

name: Anti-aging Day Cream
description:
Alison Claire's Anti Aging Day Cream has an astonishing array of natural active ingredients. It targets the skin’s internal structure to help reduce the signs of aging, while at the same time moisturising, nurturing and protecting the skin.

Anti Aging Day Cream contains acetyl tetrapeptide-9. This peptide directly assists the creation and arrangement of collagen fibres within the skin, helping to maintain its integrity, thickness and appearance.

To complement this effect, caprooyl-tetrapeptide-3 is a peptide that boosts proteins between the outermost layers of the skin. Reliable studies have shown it to noticeably and rapidly firm the skin and reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.

These two revitalising agents are joined by a host of natural moisturisers to keep the skin feeling softer. 
These include: argan oil, a traditional healing skin tonic; shea butter, to enhance the skin’s elasticity and barrier function; dextran, to retain moisture and add fullness; jojoba oil, to soften and sooth, and sodium hyaluronate, a superb moisturiser that is itself a normal functional component of skin.

Green tea has free-radical scavenging properties to help the skin retain its zest. Tocopherols (vitamin E) and coenzyme Q10 add to this antioxidant function. Together, they boost the skin’s internal defences and protect against the aging effects of sunlight.

Anti Aging Day Cream also has a feast of fragrance. Essential oils from apricot, lime, orange, vanilla, grapefruit, rosewood and coconut bring an enchanting aroma. And with their enriching properties they have their own conditioning and moisturising role.

Soothing aloe vera and comfrey, refreshing white willow and Siberian ginseng ensure that this cream doesn’t just work hard; it will make your skin feel calmer and relaxed too.

Ingredients:
Aqua, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera), Glycerine, Symphytum Officinale (Comfrey), Sodium Stearoyl Lactylate, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea), Glycerol Stearate, Eleutherococcus Senticosus (Siberian Ginseng), Tocopherols, Salix Alba Extract (White willow Bark), Cetyl Alcohol, Argania Spinosa (Argan Oil), Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Mannitol, Acetyl Tetrapeptide-9, Dextran, Caprooyl- Tetrapeptide-3, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba Oil), Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa Butter), Coconut Alkanes, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Coenzyme Q10, Prunus Armeniaca Extract (Apricot fruit), Aniba Rosaeodora Extract (Rosewood), Citrus Aurantifolia Extract (Lime Peel), Citrus Aurantium Dulcis Extract (Orange Peel), Vanilla Planifolia Extract (Vanilla fruit), Citrus Grandis extract (Grapefruit Peel), Cocos Nucifera Oil (Coconut Oil).

name: Lemon Shampoo
description:
The zing of lemon makes this superb for normal-to-greasy hair. With mild cleansing agents and the oil-conquering potential of lemon juice, this shampoo really shifts built-up dirt and grease. name: Emu Balm
description:
Australian Aborigines have used Emu Oil for over forty thousand years to gain relief from aches and pains, to help heal wounds quicker and protect their skin from the harsh elements of wind and sun.

Emu Balm is100 % natural and contains Emu Oil blended with Coconut oil, a combination of Essential oils including Wintergreen, Arnica, Clove, Rosemary, Clary Sage, Sweet Marjoram, Lavender, Lemongrass and Juniper

Many people purchase Emu Balm to assist with the symptoms of Arthritis, Sciatica, Fibromyalgia, Polymyalgia, Gout, Frozen Shoulder, Back Pain, (RSIs) Repetitive strain injuries, Growing Pains, Migraine, Old Injuries and a range of Sports Injuries including Tennis Elbow, Sprains, Tendonitis and Bruising
